transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaste, main Himanshu baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya hai.
Executive: Ji ji, Swapnil aur Sneha ji se discussion ho hi hogi aapki services ke regarding, right sir?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Nahi, Swapnil aur Sneha ji se discussion ho rahi hai na service ke regarding. So main dekh raha tha baar baar sir jaise 29 October ko aapne call kiya do baar, right customer care pe, phir 27 October ko, to lagatar matlab multiple calls aa rahe hain. To is wajah se connect matlab kya aur hum close bhi ho ja rahi hai hamari jo bhi concern hai, phir bhi baar baar customer se number to aapke paas hoga na Sneha ka aur Swapnil ka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Koi bhi discussion ke liye, haan direct unko call kar sakte ho ki acknowledge karna hai aur iske liye aur ek best possibility maine bana diya hai ki aapka ek group bana diya sir, theek hai? Aapki company ke naam se, ab waha pe added hain aapke account manager, sara kuch to kabhi bhi aapko koi cheez ke bare mein janna ho ya phir koi problem aa rahi ho, koi leads ka kuch bhi to aap waha pe ek message text kar dijiye aapke paas, saamne se call aa jayega. Kyunki really call hai jo aap customer care pe aapne kiya last ke teen char din mein tak average mein, right?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aur kaafi der tak discussion bhi hui Swapnil sahab se ek dedh ghante baat hui hui sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Unhone mere ko bataya ki aapke catalog mein kuch kami hai, kuch wo hai to main sahi karun. Unhone aapke mere manager ne aise bola ki kabhi
Executive: Awaaz kat rahi hai, kya kare sir?
Customer: Mere manager ne aise kabhi bola ki aapka catalog kharab hai, falana ye isme mistake hai, wo mistake hai bataya kya kabhi?
Executive: Haan to wo to aap bataoge na discussion jab sabse jab se aapki Sneha ji account manager hai correction wagera kiya hoga, discussion hui hogi sir jo jaha pe bhi gap hai aapke catalog mein sir category ka ho gaya, phir kuch product mein aapka jo hai specification nahi hai uske bare mein diya nahi hua kuch bhi, details kam hai. To wo sare cheez aapke account manager ne aapko guide kiya hoga aur wo cheez aapko karna hai. Ab isme aur improvement ki requirement hai, catalog aur best ho sakta hai sir.
Customer: Unhone bheja wo catalog, ab main laga doon.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kya bheja unhone?
Executive: Main photo bheja hun catalog ka.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo lagwa do.
Executive: Theek hai wo group mein bhejiye, group mein aap add hue hain dekhiye ek baar. Message aaya aapke paas check kijiye WhatsApp check kijiye.
Dekho IndiaMART help desk Adil Marble and Suppliers aaya hai to isme aap bhejiye jo bhi aapko add karwana hai.
Customer: Sir ko madam ko bheja hun na main.
Executive: Nahi aap is group mein bhejo sir, madam ko mat bhejiye is group mein bhejiye taaki main bhi dekhun ki kahan pe gap aa raha hai aur acknowledge ho raha hai ki nahi aapki problem ko. Is group pe bhejiye aap.
Koi bhi concern ho, kuch bhi add karana ho, kuch bhi update karana ho aap is group pe bhejiye.
Yaha pe sara discussion hoga aur agar ek available nahi hai to dusre logon aapke acknowledge karenge, dusra nahi hai to teesra karega to teen teen log hain jo aapke catalog pe jo bhi aapki concern aa rahi hai kyunki frequently aapki call aa rahi hai hamari customer care pe. To aapki yaha pe resolve ho jayegi sari problem agar teenon mein se koi na koi to available hoga jo aapko acknowledge kare at instance sir.
Customer: Bhejta hun aapko.
Executive: Mila aapko WhatsApp pe gaya sir message gaya?
Check kijiye group bana hai, aaya message gaya aapke paas?
Customer: Bhej diya maine group.
Executive: Haan theek hai to ye jo bhi hai sir yaha pe aap communicate kiya kijiye, aap jo customer care pe call karte ho ya phir aap mail to wo to directly phir hume hi acknowledge karna hota hai. To abhi aapke jaise hui hai sir photo mein bolta hun Sneha ko to aapka add kar degi sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Kitne photo, kitne photo bheje diye abhi naye photo ya phir purane wale mein update karne ke liye keh rahe ho aap?
Customer: Purane wale mein update kar raha hun.
Executive: Achcha purane wale mein update karna hai. Theek hai. To bhej dijiye aur kuch bhi agar leads ke bare mein feedback dena hai, koi bhi concern hai to aap is yaha pe aapko update kar sakte ho. Baki jo hai regular basis pe aapke account manager aapse connect kar hi hai. Aap yaha pe hume aap hai likh ke ya phir call back requirement hai, aap video meeting ki requirement hai aap message kar dena hum aapko call kar liya karenge. To kaisa mil raha hai overall business benefits kaisa aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Benefits kaisa aa raha hai aapka total overall?
Customer: Koi dikkat aayegi to main aapko call kar dunga.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai to aap mera number bhi ye save kar lijiye aur aapki jo concern kal aapne customer care pe call kiya tha usko main close kar raha hun sir. Feedback de dijiyega aapki problem acknowledge ho gayi hai aur ye aapka update ho jayega sir, theek hai? To aap feedback zarur de dijiyega abhi call ka. Call ka feedback sir. Theek hai? Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's catalog has some deficiencies.

- Wants to update photos in the catalog.

- Frequent calls to customer care.



Resolution:

- Executive created a WhatsApp group for communication.

- Customer added to the WhatsApp group.

- Executive will close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send photos in WhatsApp group.

- Customer to provide call feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, whatsapp group, update, feedback, buyleads
